events.name: PEV battery recycling infrastructure planning in California
events.wd_label: PEV battery recycling infrastructure planning in California
events.wd_description: This event explores the optimal strategies for planning and constructing the necessary infrastructure to support the projected increase in plug-in electric vehicle (PEV) use in California, focusing on life-cycle assessment (LCA) and geographic information systems (GIS) analysis of end-of-life scenarios for lithium-ion batteries (LIBs).
events.description: This event explores the optimal strategies for planning and constructing the necessary infrastructure to support the projected increase in plug-in electric vehicle (PEV) use in California, focusing on life-cycle assessment (LCA) and geographic information systems (GIS) analysis of end-of-life scenarios for lithium-ion batteries (LIBs).

events.name: LCA and GIS analysis
events.wd_description: Utilizing life-cycle assessment (LCA) and geographic information systems (GIS) to analyze the energy, greenhouse gas (GHG), water use, and criteria air pollutant implications of end-of-life infrastructure networks for LIBs in California.
events.description: Utilizing life-cycle assessment (LCA) and geographic information systems (GIS) to analyze the energy, greenhouse gas (GHG), water use, and criteria air pollutant implications of end-of-life infrastructure networks for LIBs in California.

events.name: methodology
events.wd_description: Applying life-cycle assessment to evaluate the environmental impacts of end-of-life LIB infrastructure, including energy use, GHG emissions, water use, and air pollutants.
events.description: Applying life-cycle assessment to evaluate the environmental impacts of end-of-life LIB infrastructure, including energy use, GHG emissions, water use, and air pollutants.

events.name: modeling
events.wd_description: Using GIS to model the optimal locations for battery dismantling and recycling facilities, considering both in-state and out-of-state scenarios.
events.description: Using GIS to model the optimal locations for battery dismantling and recycling facilities, considering both in-state and out-of-state scenarios.

events.name: End-of-life scenarios
events.wd_description: Assessing multiple end-of-life scenarios for LIBs, including hydrometallurgical and pyrometallurgical recycling processes.
events.description: Assessing multiple end-of-life scenarios for LIBs, including hydrometallurgical and pyrometallurgical recycling processes.

events.name: rometallurgical recycling
events.wd_description: Evaluating the hydrometallurgical recycling process for LIBs, focusing on its environmental and economic impacts.
events.description: Evaluating the hydrometallurgical recycling process for LIBs, focusing on its environmental and economic impacts.

events.name: ometallurgical recycling
events.wd_description: Evaluating the pyrometallurgical recycling process for LIBs, focusing on its environmental and economic impacts.
events.description: Evaluating the pyrometallurgical recycling process for LIBs, focusing on its environmental and economic impacts.

events.name: Infrastructure optimization
events.wd_description: Optimizing the infrastructure for LIB recycling in California to minimize economic and environmental impacts, including the optimal number and locations of dismantling and recycling facilities.
events.description: Optimizing the infrastructure for LIB recycling in California to minimize economic and environmental impacts, including the optimal number and locations of dismantling and recycling facilities.

events.name: tralized recycling scenario
events.wd_description: Creating a centralized recycling scenario for California with one facility capable of handling the annual disposed battery flows.
events.description: Creating a centralized recycling scenario for California with one facility capable of handling the annual disposed battery flows.

events.name: imization analysis
events.wd_description: Estimating the optimal number of dismantling facilities based on the minimization of capital and transportation costs.
events.description: Estimating the optimal number of dismantling facilities based on the minimization of capital and transportation costs.

events.name: spatial optimization
events.wd_description: Developing an algorithm for geospatial optimization of dismantling and recycling facility sites using a location-allocation methodology.
events.description: Developing an algorithm for geospatial optimization of dismantling and recycling facility sites using a location-allocation methodology.

events.name: Environmental and economic impacts
events.wd_description: Analyzing the environmental and economic impacts of collecting, dismantling, and recycling PEV batteries, and the effects on human health.
events.description: Analyzing the environmental and economic impacts of collecting, dismantling, and recycling PEV batteries, and the effects on human health.

events.name: lection and transportation impacts
events.wd_description: Evaluating the environmental and economic burdens of collecting and transporting PEV batteries for recycling.
events.description: Evaluating the environmental and economic burdens of collecting and transporting PEV batteries for recycling.

events.name: ycling process impacts
events.wd_description: Assessing the environmental and economic impacts of different recycling processes for PEV batteries.
events.description: Assessing the environmental and economic impacts of different recycling processes for PEV batteries.

events.name: an health impacts
events.wd_description: Incorporating human health damages from air emissions into the model to identify areas at risk during the infrastructure scale-up.
events.description: Incorporating human health damages from air emissions into the model to identify areas at risk during the infrastructure scale-up.

events.name: Optimal facility location analysis
events.description: Using GIS modeling to identify optimal locations for battery dismantling and recycling facilities to minimize economic and environmental impacts.

events.name: Transportation impact reduction
events.description: Utilizing rail and truck transportation to significantly reduce transportation-related GHG emissions for in-state and out-of-state recycling scenarios.

events.name: Centralized recycling scenario
events.description: Assuming a single recycling facility capable of handling the annual disposed battery flows using pyrometallurgy
